name: ChatGPT
description: Your all-purpose helper. Ask it for recipes, to draft a tough email to a client, or to plan a week's worth of family meals.

name: Canva
description: Design anything, fast. Create social media posts, birthday invitations, or business flyers using thousands of easy-to-use templates.

name: Todoist
description: A simple to-do list to organize your life and work. Great for managing family shopping lists, work projects, or planning your day.

name: Midjourney
description: Create stunning, artistic, and photorealistic images just by describing what you want. Best for high-quality creative projects.

name: Perplexity AI
description: An 'answer engine' that's great for research. Use it to find the best local parks or get a summary of a topic with cited sources.

name: Claude
description: A friendly AI assistant that is great at creative writing and summarizing long documents, like legal contracts or school articles.

name: ElevenLabs
description: Create realistic, human-sounding voiceovers. You can read any text aloud, perfect for business videos or listening to articles.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: (For tech users) An AI pair programmer that suggests code and helps you write software faster. (We'll keep one for the techies!)

name: NotebookLM
description: A research assistant that 'chats' with your personal files. Upload your meeting notes, class lectures, or project plans to instantly summarize them and find answers.
